name: Balls!
description:
this is a fun little puzzle game about a little steel ball that rolls around collecting coins and trying to find the star!

this game was made for the Inspire game jam so I'm going to put my inspiration here.

several months ago I was experimenting with ball physics and found the results 

amazing! I desperately wanted to make a game out of it but could never find the time until now that I've entered this game jam I could put other projects aside and focus on this game thanks to the founders of this game jam!

thanks, Dallas!
